search.query: | mstats count(*) where `winmetrics_index` BY host | stats count
| inputlookup host_status.csv | search status="inactive" | stats count by status

| mstats avg("% Processor Time") as Processor_time where `winmetrics_index` BY host instance | search instance=_Total | fields - instance | sort - Processor_time | eval Processor_time=round(Processor_time,2) | head 10

| mstats avg("% Committed Bytes In Use") as perc_mem_used avg("Available MBytes") as Free_MBytes where `winmetrics_index` BY host instance | fields - instance | sort - perc_mem_used | eval perc_mem_used=round(perc_mem_used,2) | eval Free_MBytes=round(Free_MBytes,2) | head 10

| mstats avg("% Free Space") as perc_free_space avg("Free Megabytes") as Free_MB where `winmetrics_index` BY host instance | search instance=*: | sort - Free_MB | eval perc_free_space=round(perc_free_space,2) | eval Free_MB=round(Free_MB,2) | head 10

| mstats avg("Bytes Sent/sec") as Bytes_Sent avg("Bytes Received/sec") as Bytes_Received avg("Current Bandwidth") as Current_Bandwidth where `winmetrics_index` BY host instance | eval Bytes_Sent=round(if(isnull(Bytes_Sent),0,Bytes_Sent),2) | eval Bytes_Received=round(if(isnull(Bytes_Received),0,Bytes_Received),2) | eval send_utilisation=round((Bytes_Sent/Current_Bandwidth)*100,5) | eval receive_utilisation=round((Bytes_Received/Current_Bandwidth)*100,5) | eval total_utilisation=round((send_utilisation+receive_utilisation)/2,2) | sort - receive_utilisation | fields - Bytes_Sent Bytes_Received instance Current_Bandwidth | head 10
